title: ILocalCircularPatternFeatureData.Spacing2
description: Gets or sets the spacing between pattern instances in Direction 2 of this bidirectional circular component pattern feature.
returns: Distance in radians between pattern instances in Direction 2
remarks:
This property is only available when:
ILocalCircularPatternFeatureData::Direction2
is true, and
ILocalCircularPatternFeatureData::Symmetric
is false.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details on using this property.
